title: MINI SRI LANKA TOUR
desc: The Classic Mini Tour package covers the most important places in Sri Lanka. Kandy, Dambulla, Sigiriya, Anuradhapura and Polonnaruwa.All our tour programmes can be changed and added according to your choices. We are happy to plan your holiday according to your plans. Our team will be available to you 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

title: SRI LANKA CULTURAL TOUR
desc: The Cultural Tour  package covers Sri Lankan heritage and cultural tours focus mainly on “the cultural triangle.” The cultural triangle connects three ancient world heritage cities, namely Anuradhapura, Polonnaruwa, and Kandy. The cultural triangle has thousands of rural villages where authentic Sri Lankan culture mingles with many more mini heritage sites. Day 01-Negombo, Day 02-Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage and Anuradhapura, Day 03-Mihintale rock and Polonnaruwa, Day 04-Sigiriya Rock and Minneriya National Park, Day 05-Golden Rock Temple and Temple of the Tooth, Day 06-Colombo City

title: BEST OF SRI LANKA TOUR
desc: Discover the best Sri Lanka tour package designed for you to explore the natural bounties, mesmerizing landscapes, and historical structures of this island nation. Day 01-Negombo, Day 02-Anuradhapura, Day 03-Sigiriya / Wildlife Safari, Day 04-Dambulla / Matale / Kandy, Day 05 - Kandy / Pinnawala, Day 06 - Nuwara Eliya, Day 07 - Airport – Colombo

title: CLASSIC SRI LANKA TOUR
desc: The Classic Sri Lanka Tour package includes the best the island can offer including ancient cities, tea-growing hills, wildlife parks, and palm-fringed beaches. DAY 01 - Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage and Sigiriya rock, DAY 02 - Polonnaruwa, DAY 03 - Golden Rock Temple and Temple of the Tooth, DAY 04 - Tea Factory, DAY 05 - Ella Gap and Ravana Waterfall, DAY 06 - Galle Dutch Fortress, DAY 07 - Beach Vacation, DAY 08 - Turtle Hatchery, Day 09 - Airport – Colombo

title: EXPLORE SRI LANKA TOUR
desc: The explore Sri Lanka tour package covers Negombo, Habarana, Kandy, and Bentota so that you can experience nature, and Sri Lankan culture and have a beach stay. DAY 01 - Negombo, DAY 02 - Anuradhapura and Mihintale rock, DAY 03 - Polonnaruwa, DAY 04 - Sigiriya Rock and Golden Rock Temple, DAY 05 - Elephant Orphanage and Temple of the tooth, DAY 06 - Hortain Plains, DAY 07 - Yala National Park, DAY 08 - Galle Dutch Fortress, DAY 09 - Beach Vacation, DAY 10 - Colombo -Airport

title: SRI LANKA ULTIMATE TOUR
desc: Ultimate Sri Lanka Tour Package is a fifteen(15) days almost everything covered holiday trip in Sri Lanka. DAY 01 - Airport - Negombo, DAY 02 - Pinnawala Elephant Orphanage and Sigiriya rock, DAY 03 - Polonnaruwa, DAY 04 - Sigiriya - Habarana, DAY 05 - Matale - Kandy, DAY 06 - Kandy, DAY 07 - Nuwara Eliya, DAY 08 - Nuwara Eliya, DAY 09 - Ella - Yala, DAY 10 - Yala National Park, DAY 11 - Galle Dutch Fortress, Day 12/13/14 - Beach Vacation, DAY 15 - Colombo -Airport.
